item.title: Linux Shell Foo
item.author: philmish
item.description: Find Get the most recently modified file from a directory: 1 find /path/to/target/dir -type f -exec ls -t1 {} + | head -1 Find the 10 largest files of a directory and its sub directories recursively: 1 find / -type f -printf '%s %p\n' | sort -nr | head -10 Find all files between 10Mb and 20Mb 1 find / -type f -size +10M -size -20M Find all files created after 00:00:00 31.
